= Wave Hardware Documentation =

== Display Driver ==
S8500: TL2796 

S8530: LG4573
[http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1245998 documentation about S8530 lcd panel]

== Processor ==
ARM v7 Processor rev 2 (v7)

== Memory ==
S8500 and S8530 are similar to I9000, but they have less physical RAM

S8500 have ONLY 128+256=384MB RAM memory (Galaxy S have 512MB).

Wave has KLM2G1DEDD 2GB MLC NAND, partitioned

Info: 
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=899661
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1012856&page=4

== Proximity sensor ==
GP2A Proximity Sensor, Sharp

== Magnetic field sensor ==
AK8973 3-axis Magnetic field sensor, Asahi Kasei Microdevices
